name: Galarian Weezing
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: This Pokémon consumes particles that contaminate the air. Instead of leaving droppings, it expels clean air.

abilities.name: Neutralizing Gas
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent’s Pokémon in play have no Abilities, except for Neutralizing Gas.

attacks.name: Severe Poison
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon during Pokémon Checkup.
